TEI.2.document_title: Micah P Flint to Stephen F Austin, 04-15-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Micah P. Flint to Austin, Alexandria, La., April 15, 1831. Introducing James Buggies, newspaper man and teacher. Rapid emigration to Texas. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 643
